locations.name: Kothrud
locations.description: Kothrud is a well-developed residential area located in Pune. It is known for its educational institutions, cultural heritage, and vibrant community life.

locations.name: kothrud
locations.description: Kothrud is a well-developed residential area located in Pune. It is known for its educational institutions, cultural heritage, and vibrant community life.

locations.name: Shaniwar Wada
locations.description: Shaniwar Wada was once a stately mansion built by Bajirao I in 1730 AD. It offers a glimpse into the grand past of the Peshwas.

locations.name: Aga Khan Palace
locations.description: Aga Khan Palace is known for its architectural excellence and historical significance. It is the headquarters of the Gandhi National Memorial Society.

locations.name: Osho Ashram
locations.description: A tranquil place for meditation and peace, following the ideologies of Osho.
